flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_ACONFIG_FLAG_DEFAULT_PERMISSION
flag_declaration.description: The default permission for all flags

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_ACONFIG_REQUIRE_ALL_READ_ONLY
flag_declaration.description: If true, it is an error to set the permission of any aconfig flags to READ_WRITE.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_ACONFIG_VALUE_SETS
flag_declaration.description: Aconfig value sets assembled by release-config

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AIDL_USE_UNFROZEN
flag_declaration.description: Enables the use of the unfrozen versions of AIDL interfaces. When this is `False` the libraries of the latest unfrozen version of a stable interface will behave like the last frozen version. When this is `True` the libraries behave like the lastest unfrozen version like they always have.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_APEX_BOOT_JARS_PREBUILT_EXCLUDED_LIST
flag_declaration.description: jars need to be excluded from Apex Boot Jars for targets with mainline prebuilts enabled.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_APEX_CONTRIBUTIONS_ADBD
flag_declaration.description: The contributions made by apexes (source or prebuilts) to the rest of the build.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_APEX_CONTRIBUTIONS_PRIMARY_LIBS
flag_declaration.description: flag to enable prebuilts for primary libs module (DCLA)

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_APEX_CONTRIBUTIONS_TELEMETRY_TVP
flag_declaration.description: flag to enable prebuilts for mainline telemetry tvp

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_APEX_MOUNT_DATA_APEX_EARLY
flag_declaration.description: Mounts Data APEXes in apexd-bootstrap stage

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_APEX_USE_EROFS_PREINSTALLED
flag_declaration.description: Uses erofs as a default file system for preinstalled/bundled APEXes.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_ATTEST_MODULES
flag_declaration.description: Support attestation of modules

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVATAR_PICKER_APP
flag_declaration.description: Move User avatar picker from SettingsLib to preinstalled app.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ALLOW_PREINSTALLED_APPS
flag_declaration.description: Enables acces to the AVF APIs to pre-installed apps.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_DEVICE_ASSIGNMENT
flag_declaration.description: Enables assigning hardware devices to the guest VMs. If this flag is enabled, then RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_MICRODROID_VENDOR_MODULES must also be enabled.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_DICE_CHANGES
flag_declaration.description: Enables new DICE functionality in Microdroid VMs.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_EARLY_VM
flag_declaration.description: Adds supports for VMs in the early boot, before /data mount.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_LLPVM_CHANGES
flag_declaration.description: Enables new llPvm functionality in Microdroid VMs.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_MICROFUCHSIA
flag_declaration.description: Allows microfuchsia to run on AVF.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_MULTI_TENANT_MICRODROID_VM
flag_declaration.description: Enables running multiple payloads in the same Microdroid VM instance.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_NETWORK
flag_declaration.description: Adds supports for network functionality in VMs.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_REMOTE_ATTESTATION
flag_declaration.description: Enables pVM remote attestation in Microdroid VM.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_TPU_ASSIGNABLE_DEVICE
flag_declaration.description: Adds userspace support for assigning TPU device to pVMs

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_VENDOR_MODULES
flag_declaration.description: Enables loading vendor modules (both kernel & userspace) in Microdroid VM.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_VIRT_CPUFREQ
flag_declaration.description: Enables Virtual Cpufreq support in Microdroid VM.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_VM_TO_TEE_SERVICES_ALLOWLIST
flag_declaration.description: Support for allowing some vms to access vendor smc services (b/360102915)

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_ENABLE_WIDEVINE_PVM
flag_declaration.description: Adds supports for Widevine pVM

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_FIX_VM_FILES_STORAGE_LOCATION_b359439878
flag_declaration.description: Fixes bug in how VM files are stored in apps data directory (b/359439878)

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_IMPROVE_DEBUGGABLE_VMS
flag_declaration.description: Improvements to debuggable VMs (e.g. tracing in guest VMs, earlycon)

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_MICRODROID_KERNEL_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: Specify which Microdroid kernel version to use for Microdroid VMs.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_SUPPORT_CUSTOM_VM_WITH_PARAVIRTUALIZED_DEVICES
flag_declaration.description: Enable running custom VMs with paravirtualized devices.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_AVF_SUPPORT_LONG_RUNNING_VMS
flag_declaration.description: Improves support for long running VMs

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BASE_OS_AKITA
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for AKITArelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for BLUEJAYrelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for FELIXrelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for HUSKYrelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BASE_OS_LYNX
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for LYNXrelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BASE_OS_ORIOLE
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for ORIOLErelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BASE_OS_PANTHER
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for PANTHERrelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BASE_OS_RAVEN
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for RAVENrelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BASE_OS_SHIBA
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for SHIBArelease build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BASE_OS_TANGORPRO
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set ro.build.version.base_os or ro.build.version.emergency_base_os for TANGORPRO release build. The value is set to the last approved build for the device. This is required for the SMR/EMR build to be recognized by the Partner Approvals portal.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BINDER_DEATH_RECIPIENT_WEAK_FROM_JNI
flag_declaration.description: If enabled, DeathRecipient is not strongly referenced from JNI.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BLUETOOTH_SOCKET_SERVICE
flag_declaration.description: Enables Bluetooth Socket Service

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BOARD_API_LEVEL
flag_declaration.description: The API level of current vendor API surface. It has YYYYMM format.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BOARD_API_LEVEL_FROZEN
flag_declaration.description: Set to True to freeze the board API level with vendor FRC

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BPF_ENABLE_LIBBPF
flag_declaration.description: Enables Libbpf support in bpfloader.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BUILD_FLAGS_IN_PROTOBUF
flag_declaration.description: Enable protobuf version of build flag processing. When true, the canonical source of truth for build flags is in the protobuf version of the data.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BUILD_OBJECT_SIZE_SANITIZER
flag_declaration.description: Enable object-size sanitizer

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BUILD_PURGE_PRODUCT_ADB_KEYS
flag_declaration.description: Remove product ADB keys from the build

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_BUILD_USE_VARIANT_FLAGS
flag_declaration.description: Whether to use BUILD_VARIANT overrides if available

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_CAR_SYS_EXP_TOS_RESTRICTIONS
flag_declaration.description: b/374362100: This flag controls the terms of service restriction experience in auto.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_CRASHRECOVERY_FILE_MOVE
flag_declaration.description: If true, then files are moved from platform to apex

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_CRASHRECOVERY_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: If true, then crashrecovery module is enabled as an apex

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_CREATE_ACONFIG_STORAGE_FILE
flag_declaration.description: Enable build system to create new aconfig storage files.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_DEFAULT_MODULE_BUILD_FROM_SOURCE
flag_declaration.description: The behavior for the tree wrt building mainline modules or using prebuilts

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_DEFAULT_UPDATABLE_MODULE_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: Use this flag to set version code for updatable apk and apex. This version code will be used only if the version field in module's manifest file is set to 0.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_DEPRECATE_VNDK
flag_declaration.description: feature flag to deprecate VNDK

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_DISABLE_VERIFY_OVERLAPS_CHECK
flag_declaration.description: Disable verify_overlaps check for mainline prebuilts. Only used in non-AOSP builds.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_DOCUMENTSUI_BUNDLE
flag_declaration.description: If true, then DocumentsUI is enabled as an apex

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_ENABLE_COMPOSE_IN_LAUNCHER
flag_declaration.description: b/346290823: Flag to enable Jetpack Compose dependencies in Launcher.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_FINGERPRINT_ACONFIG_PACKAGES
flag_declaration.description: Control using fingerprints to guard cross-package reads.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_HARDWARE_AUDIO_USE_CAP_AIDL
flag_declaration.description: Enables use of Configurable Audio Policy via AIDL HAL. When the flag is 'false' the framework falls back to loading the CAP config directly from the vendor partition (as it used to be with HIDL).

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_HARDWARE_BLUETOOTH_RANGING_SERVICE
flag_declaration.description: Enables Bluetooth Ranging Service

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_HC_PHR_FHIR_STRUCTURAL_VALIDATION
flag_declaration.description: This flag guards adding java_resources to the Health Connect service for PHR FHIR structural validation

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_HIDDEN_API_EXPORTABLE_STUBS
flag_declaration.description: b/319697968: Flag to determine the dependency of hiddenapi to the stubs that contain all flagged apis ("everything" stubs), or to the stubs that contain only the enabled flagged apis ("exportable" stubs).

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_INSTALL_APEX_SYSTEMSERVER_DEXPREOPT_SAME_PARTITION
flag_declaration.description: If true, the dexpreopt files of apex system server jars will be installed in the same partition as the apex.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_IS_EMR
flag_declaration.description: Set this flag to true to mark a release build as EMR (Emergency Maintenance Release).

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_IS_SMR
flag_declaration.description: Set this flag to true to mark a release build as SMR (Security Maintenance Release).

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_LARGE_SYSTEM_PROPERTY_NODE
flag_declaration.description: Allow system property storage node to be 1M to accomodate aconfig flags.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_LIBBINDER_ADDSERVICE_CACHE
flag_declaration.description: Enables caching in libbinder when registering a service.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_LIBBINDER_CLIENT_CACHE
flag_declaration.description: Enables caching in libbinder for client side when it is True.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_LIBBINDER_REMOVE_CACHE_STATIC_LIST
flag_declaration.description: Remove the static list from cache and use flags instead

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_LIBPOWER_NO_LOCK_BINDER_TXN
flag_declaration.description: b/343527537: Flag to defer acquiring libpower lock until after binder transaction to optimize wake lock acquisition.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_MAINLINE_MODULE_PREBUILT_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The version of mainline prebuilts used when prebuilts are enabled.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_MEMORY_MANAGEMENT_DAEMON
flag_declaration.description: Enables Memory Management Daemon in system image.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_MOVE_PDFRENDERER_TO_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: If true, then files are moved from platform to apex

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_MOVE_VCN_TO_MAINLINE
flag_declaration.description: If true, build VCN in the Tethering module

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_NDK_ABI_MONITORED
flag_declaration.description: Enables ABI monitoring of NDK libraries.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_NFC_MAINLINE_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: b/368405832: Flag to enable NFC mainline module

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_ONDEVICE_INTELLIGENCE_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: If true, then files are moved from platform to apex

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_EMOJI_FONT_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: Version of the emoji font file.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_FLAG_EMOJI_FONT_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: Version of the flag emoji font file.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_HEBREW_FONT_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: Version of the Hebrew font file.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_HENTAIGANA_FONT
flag_declaration.description: This flag will control of including Japanese variant (Hentaigana) font.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_LIBANDROID_RUNTIME_PUNCH_HOLES
flag_declaration.description: b/301631861: Flag to enable punching holes in apks and shared libs

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_LIBSQLITE3
flag_declaration.description: The sqlite release.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_MESSAGEQUEUE_IMPLEMENTATION
flag_declaration.description: Which MessageQueue implementation to use.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_NFC_STACK
flag_declaration.description: b/292140387: Flag to switch to the new NFC apex

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_NOTO_SANS_KHMER_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: Version of the Noto Sans Khmer font.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_PROFILING_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: Flag will control the release of the Profiling module apex.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_SOUND_PICKER
flag_declaration.description: This flag will control the rollout of new versions of the SoundPicker app.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_TZDATA_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: tzdata to be installed to the system image.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_VARIABLE_NOTO_SANS_CJK
flag_declaration.description: True for using variable font of the NotoSansCJK

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_VIRTUAL_CAMERA
flag_declaration.description: The name of the virtual camera package to add to the system partition.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PACKAGE_WEBVIEW_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The version of WebView to include in the build

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_BASE_SDK_EXTENSION_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The sdk extension version that shipped with current RELEASE_PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION. This flag is only updated when RELEASE_PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION is updated.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_MIN_SUPPORTED_TARGET_SDK_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: Used to set minimum supported target sdk version. Apps targeting sdk version lower than the set value will result in a warning being shown when any activity from the app is started.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_SDK_EXTENSION_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The sdk extension version of this release configuration.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_SDK_MINOR_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The minor SDK version of the platform. This should only be increased when the API is finalized as part of a minor release.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The SDK version of the platform, e.g. 34 for UDC. This should only be increased when the API is finalized and the codename is set to rel, not during development.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_SECURITY_PATCH
flag_declaration.description: Used to indicate the security patch that has been applied to the device. It must signify that the build includes all security patches issued up through the designated Android Public Security Bulletin. It must be of the form "YYYY-MM-DD" on production devices. It must match one of the Android Security Patch Level strings of the Public Security Bulletins. If there is no $PLATFORM_SECURITY_PATCH set, keep it empty.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The platform version. This is the 4 letter code, e.g. UD1A, UPB1, ZP1A, etc.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_VERSION_ALL_CODENAMES
flag_declaration.description: A comma separated list of all codenames that are in preview. This variable is sort of a lie for historical reasons and only includes codenames up to and including the currently active codename

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_VERSION_ALL_PREVIEW_CODENAMES
flag_declaration.description: A comma separated list of all preview codenames the platform will accept apps built against

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME
flag_declaration.description: Set to REL for production platform builds, otherwise the codename string, e.g. UpsideDownCake or VanillaIceCream

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_VERSION_KNOWN_CODENAMES
flag_declaration.description: A comma separated list of all known codenames. For REL (finalized) configurations, it has to only contain finalized codenames.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_VERSION_LAST_STABLE
flag_declaration.description: The last stable version name of the platform that was released.  During development, this stays at that previous version, while the codename indicates further work based on the previous version.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_PLATFORM_VNDK_VERSION
flag_declaration.description: The PLATFORM_VNDK_VERSION will be set to this version when the PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME is REL. This VNDK version flag will be removed when the VNDK is deprecated

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_RANGING_STACK
flag_declaration.description: b/331206299: Flag to add new generic ranging API surface

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_READ_FROM_NEW_STORAGE
flag_declaration.description: Control if we should read from new storage.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_READ_FROM_NEW_STORAGE_CC
flag_declaration.description: Enable reading from new storage from C/C++ aconfig flag codegen.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_REMOVE_LEGACY_EMOJI_FONT
flag_declaration.description: feature flag for removing legacy emoji font from system image.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SELINUX_DATA_DATA_IGNORE
flag_declaration.description: Ignore /data/data relabelling in libselinux.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SERVICE_WIFI_SPEED_PROFILE_ART_COMPILATION
flag_declaration.description: b/241823638: Flag to enable ART Speed Profile compilation for WIFI module service.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SM_OPEN_DECLARED_PASSTHROUGH_HAL
flag_declaration.description: feature flag for a new API to open declared passthrough HAL

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SUPERVISION_SERVICE
flag_declaration.description: Include SupervisionService in the build

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SYSTEM_FEATURE_AUTOMOTIVE
flag_declaration.description: System feature version for: android.hardware.type.automotive

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SYSTEM_FEATURE_EMBEDDED
flag_declaration.description: System feature version for: android.hardware.type.embedded

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SYSTEM_FEATURE_LEANBACK
flag_declaration.description: System feature version for: android.software.leanback

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SYSTEM_FEATURE_PC
flag_declaration.description: System feature version for: android.hardware.type.pc

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SYSTEM_FEATURE_TELEVISION
flag_declaration.description: System feature version for: android.hardware.type.television

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_SYSTEM_FEATURE_WATCH
flag_declaration.description: System feature version for: android.hardware.type.watch

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_TARGET_JAVA_21
flag_declaration.description: Control if we should target java 21.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_UNLOCKED_STORAGE_API
flag_declaration.description: flag to enable the unlocked-only storage API's SEPolicy rules

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_UPROBESTATS_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: If true, then uprobestats module is enabled as an apex

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_USE_DEX_V41
flag_declaration.description: feature flag for enabling new DEX file format (v41)

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_USE_OPTIMIZED_RESOURCE_SHRINKING_BY_DEFAULT
flag_declaration.description: feature flag for enabling optimized_shrink_resources: true by default

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_USE_RESOURCE_PROCESSOR_BY_DEFAULT
flag_declaration.description: feature flag for enabling use_resource_processor: true by default

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_USE_SYSTEM_FEATURE_BUILD_FLAGS
flag_declaration.description: Enable use of system feature build-time flags and codegen.

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_USE_TRANSITIVE_JARS_IN_CLASSPATH
flag_declaration.description: feature flag for enabling building with transitive classpaths

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_USE_WEBVIEW_BOOTSTRAP_MODULE
flag_declaration.description: b/318717084 - enable the WebViewBootstrap mainline module

flag_declaration.name: RELEASE_WRITE_APPCOMPAT_OVERRIDE_SYSTEM_PROPERTIES
flag_declaration.description: flag to enable the writing of appcompat override system properties. Not expected to go beyond trunk
